article.title: ATK Receives Foreign Military Sales Requirement Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alliant Techsystems (ATK) has received an $87 million firm-fixed-price contract from the U.S. Army. This is a Foreign Military Sales Requirement. The award will result in a firm-fixed-price contract for $95 million worth of rounds of various nonstandard ammunition for the Afghanistan National Army and Afghanistan National Police.
